message.body: Sofie! I'm so sorry I didn't text you yesterday, happy birthday sweetheart!! I knew it was your birthday, I'm such an idiot, I went out to dinner and forgot my phone and was so sleepy when I got home, I'm such a spacey jerk. I love you so much beautiful, I hope you had a wonderful birthday, can you talk soon?

omg amelia i thought you were mad at me bc i didn’t call for your birthday. this birthday has been ok. I miss you so much. i am so happy to hear from you. I don’t care about my birthday ... i almost forgot about it. butmy computer reminded me
Aww, I'm not mad at all!! I'm so sorry you thought that!! I love you so much!! Let's talk soon! Can you talk tonight at all? I'll be home in an hour, or later this week? I get off early Thursday.
